item.title: Is Godot 4 ready for AA- or even AAA?
item.description: Shortly after I posted my last article, Juan Linietsky, one of the founders of Godot Engine, published an article about the competitiveness of Godot Engine in AA and AAA game development. The article is really worth reading, because on the one hand he goes into the technical possibilities with Godot 4 (renderer, physics, scripting, GDExtension, …) and on the other hand he points out what he thinks is still missing to develop AA/AAA level games with the Godot Engine.
